alert.note: Alert for Cascade County below 5000ft; Eastern Glacier, Western Toole, and Central Pondera; Eastern Pondera and Eastern Teton; Eastern Toole and Liberty; Judith Basin County and Judith Gap; Little Belt and Highwood Mountains; Western and Central Chouteau County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 16 at 9:07AM MST until January 18 at 11:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM MST THURSDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 6 and 11 inches. * WHERE...Portions of central and north central Montana. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 11 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult and tire chains may be required for some vehicles. Those in the backcountry should ensure they are prepared for dangerous conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Tuesday morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.
